title: Artist Stalked IRL By Deranged TikTok Account...

media:group.media:title: Artist Stalked IRL By Deranged TikTok Account...
media:group.media:description:
This TikTok account has launched a harassment campaign against an innocent artist. Going as far as stalking them IRL and showing up at the artist's place or work.

Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/revuwu
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/Revsaysdesu
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Rev_says_desu
